name: Flashcard
description:
Make any Figma / FigJam element into flashcards that you can flip over.


Simply select the front of your card, then click the widget to add it to the side. Then, you can click the flip button (bottom right corner) to flip the card over, and add another side in the same way.


This project is open-source on GitHub. If you encounter any bugs, please submit an issue at the Issues section.


Happy flipping! :)
